Making the experience of booking at an extraordinary hotel, extraordinary

for Four Seasons

As one of the world's premiere hotel chains, Four Season's website must match the high expectations of it's guests.

Role
Design, front-end development
Team
Cottleston Pie
Live Site
fourseasons.com

Cottleston Pie was brought in to collaborate with the Four Seasons web team on redesigning a few different areas of the site.

The booking flow is the most important experience of a hotel website. Cottleston Pie designed the booking experience on fourseasons.com. This update was so well received that we were able to employ a similar approach on other sections of the site.

We worked with the Four Seasons to improve not just the user experience, but also to make pages responsive to all device sizes. We placed a priority on page weight to improve the load speed across a few sections on the site.
